radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis, no pericardial or pleural effusion. The liver demonstrates homogenous attenuation with no focal lesions. The gallbladder is normal. The pancreas is normal without lesions or ductal dilatation. The spleen is mildly enlarged (16 cm). The kidneys are normal with no lesions or hydronephrosis. The appendix is dilated and fluid-filled (1.5 cm) with peripheral stranding and mucosal hyperemia. No free fluid in the pelvis.
